definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Some OPEC states are hankering for even higher oil prices in the months ahead.
sentences.chinese: 一些歐佩克成員國甚至希望未來幾個月的油價更高。

sentences.english: Once every four years the council subjects each U.N. member to scrutiny.
sentences.chinese: 人權理事會對每個聯合國成員國每四年會評估一次。

sentences.english: However, Norway is a member of the much  smaller European Free Trade Association (EFTA).
sentences.chinese: 同時，挪威也是更小的歐洲自由貿易協會的成員國。

sentences.english: France is one of the member states of the ELL.
sentences.chinese: 法國事歐羅巴洲同盟成員國之一。

sentences.english: Montenegro is one of the non-EU states which uses the euro.
sentences.chinese: 黑山共和國是一個非歐盟成員國使用歐元的國家。

sentences.english: They also said they would pressure some members who have been overproducing.
sentences.chinese: 他們還表示要向超產的一些成員國施加壓力。

sentences.english: Member countries and dialogue partners discuss measures to enhance peace in the region.
sentences.chinese: 各成員國和對話夥伴共同商議增進本地區和平的措施。
聯合國192個成員國全部參加投票。

sentences.english: Only authorised users from Charter member countries can request images.
sentences.chinese: 只有憲章成員國的授權用戶才能申請圖像。

sentences.english: And expressing its determination to pool the efforts of member states to assist this sisterly country.
sentences.chinese: 而各成員國也表達了努力協助這個姐妹國家的決心。

sentences.english: Member countries are banned from trading with nonmembers.
sentences.chinese: 所有成員國禁止和非成員國進行鑽石貿易。

sentences.english: Consent to the recordal of the license is left to the applicable law of the Member States.
sentences.chinese: 人均表同意此一問題，留予成員國可適用的法律處理。

sentences.english: China was re-elected to the UN Human Rights Council.
sentences.chinese: 中國再次當選聯合國人權理事會成員國。

sentences.english: The European Union commissioned a report on anti- Semitism in member states.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟受成員國委託編纂一份關於反猶太主義的報告。

sentences.english: Lacroix said other nations on the Security Council expressed a similar position.
sentences.chinese: 拉克魯瓦說，安理會其他成員國也表達了類似的立場。
